PublicationServer

public class PublicationServer

The HTTP server for the publication’s manifests and assets. Serves Epubs.

  • pubBoxes

    Undocumented

    Declaration

    Swift

    public class PublicationServer
  • port

    The running HTTP server listening port.

  • add(_:with:at:)

    Add a publication to the server. Also add it to the pubBoxes

    Throws

    PublicationServerError.usedEndpoint, PublicationServerError.nilBaseUrl, PublicationServerError.fetcher.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func add(_ publication: Publication,
                    with container: Container,
                    at endpoint: String = UUID().uuidString) throws

    Parameters

    publication

    The Publication object containing the publication data.
    container

    The Container object giving access to the resources.
    endpoint

    The relative URL to access the resource on the server. The default value is a unique generated id.
